channel.title: containers on Alex Carney
channel.description: Recent content in containers on Alex Carney

item.title: Saying 'Hello, World!' with TinyGo and WebAssembly
item.description: WebAssembly is something I’ve wanted to play with for quite a while now and I’ve finally got around to taking a look at it. In this post I describe how I managed to use TinyGo to compile a “Hello, World!” Go program into WebAssembly and execute it in the browser. So that I have something to refer back to I also describe setting up my development environment as a container using LXD.
